name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Cloud Version
Creepy Cooking and Dungeon Dinner Mysterious Labyrinth
Fable of Fairy Stones
description: Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world! A significant level of suspense awaits you.

name: Watashi Dake Ireba Mondainai Yo Ne
Room Escape: Prisoners Hero
description: Be a real hero and make a plan to escape the prison in this survival adventure of jail breakout. Complete your mission and smash the jail to make it the best ever escape. Breaking the chain and discover the hidden object & use them to open the lock and release from the prison in this puzzle adventure game.

name: Beast Darling!: Kemomimi Danshi to Himitsu no Ryou
description: A otome game for iOS, Android, and Switch.

name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Prism of Eyes - Makyou no Shinjitsu
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Prism of Eyes - Shisha ni Sasageru Ishi
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.19: Rensa Suru Noroi
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Prism of Eyes - Saburou to Nazo no Hihou
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Prism of Eyes - Rokumai no Hankou
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.07: Bouen o Sagase!
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.08: Aoi Me no Ryuu
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.11: Inu to Yobareta Otoko
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.12: Futairo no Shoujo
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.14: Takusareta Yubiwa
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.16: Tsubaki no Yukue
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou Series No.18: Kadan no Itte
Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Prism of Eyes - Kyoshoku no Yoru
G-Mode Archives 24: Sangokushi Nendaiki DX
description:
Expand the territory and unify the world at a good pace.

A country stealing game that you can easily enjoy in the era of the Three Kingdoms!

"Sangokushi Nendaiki DX" is a country stealing simulation game set in the era of the Three Kingdoms in China, and can be enjoyed by a wide range of beginners and advanced users.

Let's expand our army's territory while moving units to empty territories and attacking enemy territories, and aim to unify the country with all 5 scenarios.

The battle is conducted by roulette, and it is a simple one that "the higher the number wins".

The more the force of the unit increases, the larger the number of roulette, and the more the battle becomes dominant.
Please command the warlords and reinforcements well and rule the turbulent world with your hands.

name: Rinji Shuuden
description:
The third entry in the Senbazuru series. A strange event that attacks a passenger on a mysterious train...

"No... I remember seeing the last train running leaving me behind.
After that... That's right... The next train of the last train came into the platform. On the destination panel ... it said "Temporary last train."

A few passengers boarded the last train on a certain line at midnight. The scenery wrapped in darkness. A strange unmanned station. Hydrangea flowers that emerge on the night after the rain in early summer.
The mysterious atmosphere and the fear of not being able to reach the original world are there...

The third game of the Senbazuru series. Can you get through this fear...!?

name: G-Mode Archives 14: Mystia
description:
In order to save the village crisis, the magical swordsman Meena leaves. An easy-to-play adventure fantasy that everyone wanted.

The first installment of the adventure fantasy RPG "mystia" series set on the Mystia continent.

Let's operate Meena, a magical swordsman, and go on an adventure while defeating monsters and searching for treasures in the field and dungeons!

The combat system is a simple command battle that pursues operability.

If you fight with 8 kinds of magical attributes in mind, no matter how strong the opponent is, you may be able to advance the battle to the advantage!

It is also equipped with a memo function that shows the next purpose and an auto save function, so you can play on the move with peace of mind.
Let's get rid of the many monsters that attack, solve the mystery, and regain the peace of the village.

name: Valheim: Hearth & Home
description:
Where the grass grows underfoot,
And the sky is blue overhead.
There will always be a
Hearth & Home.

name: Marblous
description:
Marblous is a marble roll and jump, platform "runner".

You just roll and jump platforms, with a few special platforms.
You have to control momentum and speed so it's not just a straight forward runner.

name: No Man's Sky: Exo Mech
description: Soar and stomp across the landscape with the Exo Mech update. Introducing a fully controllable mechanical walker, new Exocraft technologies, improvements to base building, and much more.

name: Orderless: New Skies
description: Orderless: New Skies is a 2D action-turn RPG where players can avoid enemy attacks and increase their damage with well timed button presses, replacing RNG elements with hand-eye coordination and skill. Explore an alien world and discover secrets as you try to find a way back home.

name: Dreamspace
description: DREAMSPACE is a turn-based RPG with low poly graphics along with pixel art reminiscent of a PSX game! Battles happen from a front-view perspective, with a timed attack system similar to a rhythm game!

name: Lisa: The Joyful - Arkantos
description: A fan DLC/expansion to Joyful, it takes place in a new continent called Arkantos with its own story and characters. Features 100's of new battles and enemies and six new warlords to defeat.

name: JoyTale
description: A LISA x Undertale fangame set an a alternate universe where the Flash occured in the Undertale universe

name: Super Mario Bros.
description: A remaster of the original Super Mario Bros., released exclusively as part of the Super Mario All-Stars bundle.

name: Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels
description: A remaster of the original Super Mario Bros. 2 (previously only released in Japan), released exclusively as part of the Super Mario All-Stars bundle.

name: Super Mario Bros. 2
description: A remaster of the original Super Mario Bros. 2 (the American port of Yume Koujou: Doki-doki Panic), released exclusively as part of the Super Mario All-Stars bundle.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: A remaster of the original Super Mario Bros. 3, released exclusively as part of the Super Mario All-Stars bundle.

name: Game of Dragons: Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes the Game of Dragons base game and 7 DLCs.

name: Lucky Happening: Dokidoki Munekyun Choppiri Otona-na Love Comedy Illustration Quiz
Taishou Mebiusline Taizen
description: A Nintendo Switch bundle of Taishou Mebiusline Vitable and the fandisc Taishou Mebiusline Teito Bibouroku Hare in one package.

name: Ducky Quacky
description: Ducky Quacky is 3D Platformer Game, Our main character is a Duck living in Duckland. He's a Duckish! You must collect all the keys in the levels, open the lock and go to the next level.

name: Azu-Cola
description: A doujin puzzle game reminiscent of Columns featuring Azumanga Daioh characters.

name: Cleaver: Sideshow Circus
description: Cleaver: Sideshow Circus is a retro style 8-bit video game. Play as Cleaver: The Killer Clown as he sets out on a quest to collect balloons, meat and save his daughter Lil Miss Cleaver forte clutches of the Circus Du Sinister and its leader the Ring Master. With the help of exploding pumpkins and human hearts the Cleaver should make short work of the bad guys in the classic style Single Screen Platformer.

name: Lisa: The Clueless
description: A Lisa The Painful fan game that's about two fishmen that leave their village and have to collect three items to be able to return to their home.

name: Lisa: The Wishless
description: A Lisa: The Painful fan game where you play as a soldier of the Rando Army who misses his past, and is ready to perform any task, no matter how tough or dirty.

name: Rubato
description: A collect-a-thon about a frog fixing the solar system after it explodes for some reason.

name: Koezaru wa Akai Hana: Taiga ha Mirai wo Tsumugu
description: A otome game for PlayStation Portable by Dramatic Create and Operetta.

name: Koezaru ha Akai Hana After Disc: Ayanasu Mirai
description: A fandisc to Koezaru wa Akai Hana

name: Miyako
description: Miyako is an otome game, developed by Sanctuary and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Gakuen K: Wonderful School Days
description: Gakuen K is an otome visual novel based on K Project by GoHands and GoRa featuring an original character exlusive to the game, Konohana Saya, as the protagonist.

name: Shiratsuyu no Kai
description: Shiratsuyu no Kai is a otome adventure game for the PlayStation Portable that was released on August 1, 2013 by Otomate.

name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
description: 2 Fast 2 Furious ups the ante of racing games with total 3D action on your phone. Based on the monster sequel to The Fast and The Furious, you are a tough street racer making your money on the sweltering streets of Miami. In your customized nitro-powered vehicle you have to take out the contenders to your crown and keep winning to make your car unstoppable. Featuring characters from the movie including TEJ, who'll be on hand to help you along the way.

name: Isochronism
description: Rune wakes up in a surreal landscape, only to be asked to solve riddles for unknown reasons. Accompanied by their friend Shara they shall see just how deep the rabbit hole goes.

name: Cosmo Battle XXX
description: Crush your enemies. Fly and win.

name: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus
description:
An HD remaster of Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus included in "The Sly Collection."

Sly Cooper, the notorious international thief, is out to reclaim what is rightfully his. Prepare to infiltrate the most secure places in the world.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
description:
An HD remaster of Sly 2: Band of Thieves included in "The Sly Collection."

Sly and the gang are back! And they're ready to pull off the biggest job of their lives, yet! Journey around the world and beat the Klaww Gang at their own game.

name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
description:
An HD remaster of Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves included in "The Sly Collection."

Unlike the Playstation 3 version, The PS Vita version does not support the two-player minigames.

The thieving gang returns for its greatest heist ever! Your favorite characters return from Sly 2: Band of Thieves, as well as new playable specialists like Carmelita Fox and the Guru.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 7 - Otonari Keiji no Sousa Memo
description:
A lost Chihuahua and a kind town police officer. With their ideal image of a detective in their hearts, this mismatched duo races through the city!

A small police box at the crossroads in front of the station, the police station in front of Marihamadai Station.
A lost puppy was entrusted to Officer Otonari, who was still working at the police box as a police officer at that time.
The dog breed is Chihuahua. According to the attached collar, the name is Chappie.

Officer Otonari, tasked with searching for the owner of Chappie, got an eyewitness testimony that a person who seemed to be the owner entered the Marihama Grand Hotel as a result of the interview in front of the station.

As long as you know where you are, the solution is near. The man and the dog began their investigation in the hotel lobby, but when a guest came running in with a pale face, they were drawn into further incidents...

Otonari Koichi, 26, is always by your side in heart. To protect the peace of Marihamadai, he runs through the town with his little partner!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Momoko 1200%
description:
Your heart will race as you watch Momoko grow! Moe & exciting shooting action!

"Momoko 1200%" is a remake of Jaleco's action game "Momoko 120%", which was previously released for feature phones.

The main character is Momoko, a 12-year-old girl who falls in love with the Martian prince "The Greatest Fire Dancer".

Use light-hearted action to tear and throw the Martians who have come to invade Earth! Tear and throw!

Aim for the exit somewhere in the field! Clear the stage by entering the exit or defeating a certain number of enemies!

As the game progresses, Momoko will grow into a "15-year-old (high school student)" or "18-year-old (working adult)". Depending on how you behave in the game, the schools and occupations you can go to, and even the special moves you can use will change. What kind of appearance will your Momoko show you?

Pay attention to the Mars Prince's preferred type.
The closer you get to the type, the more heated the final battle will be, and the greater the bonus score upon clearing. The type changes each time you play, so you can play under various conditions.

Use special moves to destroy obstacles.
Attack not only enemies but also walls and lockers to gain an advantage in the game! By destroying walls and lockers, you may be able to find a shortcut to the exit or items necessary for Momoko's growth.

Momoko grows according to how you play. Let's grow Momoko by adjusting the number of enemies defeated, the number of items acquired, etc. If you defeat too much or acquire too much, you may become an unintended type...

name: G-Mode Archives+: Mikuni Field Combat
description:
Near-future weapons hit the world of the Three Kingdoms!
Capture famous heroes and great heroes and invade the world of war!

Released for feature phones in 2007, "Mikuni Field Combat" is a spin-off of Jaleco's shooter game "Field Combat," released for arcades and the Family Computer in 1985.

"Field Combat" is a strategic shooter game in which you control the futuristic UFO-type attack aircraft carrier "Genesis-3" and capture enemy units with a capture beam to use them as allies while trying to clear stages.
For some reason, this futuristic weapon, the "Genesis-3," is storming into the world of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" at the end of the 2nd century!

The system of capturing enemies with a capture beam and using them as allies remains the same, but more than 130 popular generals familiar to fans of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms appear!

Recruit your favorite generals to your side and survive the wars of mainland China, where intrigue is rife!

Operate the futuristic UFO-type attack aircraft carrier "Genesis-3", defeat enemy infantry and obstacles, recruit your favorite generals as your allies, and aim to conquer the stage! Can you survive the wars of mainland China, where political intrigue is swirling?

Capture enemy generals and make them your allies. Use the capture beam to capture enemies and make them your allies! More than 130 popular generals familiar to fans of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms appear!

Use your allies' unique strategies to gain an advantage in battle!
Each captured general has a strategy (special move) that will help you. Figure out when to use it and advance the battle more advantageously!

Operate the attack mobile aircraft carrier Genesis-3 to occupy the enemy castle at the top of the map. Damage the boss enemy, who is always present on each side, and defeat, capture, or force them to retreat, and the castle gate will open. Enter the castle gate that Genesis-3 opens to proceed to the next stage.

Also, if you damage famous generals, including boss enemies, and weaken their remaining vitality to 30%, a "GET!" message will appear above them, and you will be able to capture them with a capture beam. You can make captured generals your allies after clearing the stage. Capture all the strong enemies and make them your allies to create your own strongest army (you can have up to 14 generals). If your ship, Genesis-3, loses its vitality or the time limit runs out, it will be destroyed and the game will be over. Allied generals who are incapacitated in battles on each stage will not be lost, and will be revived in the next stage or when you continue.

All allied generals always have one "strategy." A strategy is a powerful technique that can only be activated once per stage.
When the strategy you want to use is lit up in the bottom right of the screen, press the strategy button at the right time to change the course of the battle.
Only one strategy can be active at a time, and when a new strategy is activated, the previous one will be overwritten.
Continuous strategies last for about 30 seconds, and damage-dealing strategies have the following expected damage value: Water Strategy > Fire Strategy > Ambush Strategy.

Each general has a rarity, and is ranked in the following order: GR (Greater Rare) > R (Rare) > S (Special) > N (Normal).
The higher the rarity of a general, the less likely they are to appear randomly (as a general excluding bosses), but you can expect a higher level of ability.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 10 - Eigou-kai Jiken
description: The year is 1999. The end of the century is a whirlwind of ominous prophecies and incidents. What is the purpose of the "Eigo-kai," an unidentified organization involved...

name: G-Mode Archives+: Megami Tensei Gaiden - Shinyaku Last Bible
description: Together with the demon, we will open up our destiny. The story that is the end of everything and the beginning of everything.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible II - Hajimari no Fukuin
description: Boy, be the light that illuminates the world. The gospel of the beginning rings out in the land covered with despair.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 2 - Kairoukan Satsujin Jiken
description:
The "Kailoukan", a strange building surrounded by the sea on all sides. Inside a mansion closed underwater, the curtain rises on a tragedy.

Hello, everyone.
My name is Ikurumi, a game scenario writer.

Do you know the previous work "Masked Fantasy Murder Case"?
This time, I would like to introduce an incident that happened in a strange building called "Kairokan" six months after that incident.

It is said that it was built by the former chairman of a famous architectural company as a stranger. This story begins from the place where we are invited to the inauguration event of the mansion.

7 invited guests who visited. The owner of the mansion who will not appear forever. And...

A tragedy that happens in a mansion closed in the sea.
Who is the culprit? What's the motive? And what is the secret hidden in this building? The truth is, in the dark sea...

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 1 - Kamen Gensou Satsujin Jiken
description:
Online RPG "Takrimakus" that dies when you play. Uncover the secret hidden in the game, the truth.

Hello, everyone. My name is Ikurumi, a game scenario writer.

This is the first mobile phone game series that introduces the activities of my friend detective "Ryosuke Kibukawa".

This incident started with an investigation of a rumor of an online game that you will die if you play it. At first, I thought it was a simple request, but really one after another...

Choose an action (command) and enjoy the many mysteries woven by complex human patterns.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 3 - Shisha no Rakuen
description:
Shangri-La, an amusement park named after an ideal world In a paradise overflowing with smiles, a banquet in the name of judgment begins.

A few months have passed since the nightmare of the previous work, "The Kairoukan Murder Case." Running out of material, Ikuo visits his friend, Kibukawa.

When he returns to the office for the first time in a while, he is approached by Haruna Kikukawa, a beautiful secretary working at the much talked about amusement park, "Shangri-La."

The request is to provide security and investigate the cult-like threatening letters and creepy pranks that have been sent to the amusement park.

However, the president, Hiroshi Kimijima, asks that the matter be handled confidentially and without telling the police.

Though harboring doubts, Ikuo and Izuna decide to head to "Shangri-La."

An invitation from paradise brought by the beautiful secretary. A banquet called "judgment" begins from there.

Are the cheers echoing through the amusement park, named after a utopia, shouts of joy? Or...?

name: G-Mode Archives+: City Connection Rocket
description:
Agent Clarice, step on the accelerator! In order to protect the peace of the earth, fly to the world with your favorite car!

City Connection Rocket, which was previously released for feature phones, is a legitimate sequel to the City Connection series, one of Jaleco's signature works.

Clarice, an agent dispatched from the United Nations, boards the new Clariscar and goes on a mission to recover the super-secret documents stolen by the runaway secret society "Spiritus".

Let's find the super-classified documents hidden on the stage while handling enemy characters well by making full use of the series's annual "oil cans" and "super rockets" that can destroy the road with your body.

There are also many huge bosses such as tanks and battle helicopters, and hidden characters with Jaleco fans.
Also pay attention to the cute Clarice that is displayed when the stage is cleared!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Ninja Jajamaru-kun - Ranbu
description:
Crimson ninja costumes run through the four seasons!
Use a variety of actions and rescue Princess Sakura!

This work, "Ninja Jajamaru-kun Ranbu", which was previously released on feature phones, is a
legitimate sequel to the "Ninja Jajamaru-kun" series, one of Jaleco's representative works.

On stages themed around the four seasons of spring, summer, fall, and winter, use a variety of items such as "shurikens," "scrolls," and "flames," as well as advanced actions such as "triangle jump" and "tackle," to face off against formidable monsters!

By acquiring the "souls" that appear when defeating monsters, the special attack gauge will rise, and when the special attack gauge reaches MAX, it will enter a state of wild dance in which the effects of items become even more powerful!

Furthermore, if you defeat a monster and obtain a soul while in a wild dance state, the wild dance state will continue!
Don't give the monster a chance to counterattack and dance magnificently in the land of peace!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Burari Sekai Untei
description:
Because there is untei!
Travel around the world on an endless ride.

"Burari Sekai Untei" is an endless one-touch action game where you simply advance through the untei surrounding the earth.

The basic operation is just to press the button and move forward.

However, on the way, the Untei's bar may come off, or someone walking on it may step on it, so hold down the button to extend your arm, and use the 1st and 2nd jumps to avoid it.

As the stage progresses, the scenery changes and the screen scrolling speed increases.
My first goal is to circumnavigate the globe. However, you can continue the Untei journey even after completing it until you make a mistake.

Let's challenge the limits of our physical strength to see how many times we can go around the earth!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Maou ga Ochiru Hi
description:
Until the final boss “Demon King” comes…minimum 5 minutes! ? Form the strongest party with your friends and intercept the Demon King!

“The Day the Demon King Falls” is an easy-to-use RPG that allows you to reach the ending in as little as 5 minutes.

According to the prophecy of the great god Odin, there is only one year left until the final boss, the Demon King, appears.

Grow your hero through training and adventures within a limited amount of time, and prepare for the coming demon lord.

Don't worry, the main character has 15 friends with unique personalities.

Depending on which characters you raise as your companions, your strategy and tactics in battle will change dramatically, and over 100 different events will occur in various locations such as training grounds and adventure grounds.

From events centered around friendship, love, and hate to events that are a bit more sexy, you'll be sure to discover new things every time you play.
And once you get into it, you'll discover the true secret hidden in the "Demon King"...

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 4 - Shirasagi ni Aka no Hane
description:
This year, red leaves are dancing in the hearts of the white herons left behind. The story of assistant detective Shirasagisu Itsuna and her unknown past.

“I… where was I trying to go? ”

This story begins with the protagonist, who has lost her memory, waking up in a mountain forest filled with autumn leaves.

The protagonist is rescued by a high school girl who calls herself ``Taihouin Izuna'' and learns that this is Momoshiro Village, a small village deep in the mountains of A Prefecture.

Who am I? Why did you come to such a remote village? Why did I lose my memory?

As the protagonist works with Ituna to unravel her memories, she becomes embroiled in the inheritance issues swirling around the village.

This is a sad and heartbreaking incident that leads her to pursue her career as a detective. In this work, you can enjoy the first and second parts of "Crimson Feathers on the White Heron".

name: G-Mode Archives+: Ketsui - Kizuna Jigoku-tachi DX
description:
The bonds I have with my friends will not let go even if I fall into hell. ``New authentic shooting'' where you fight with determination in your heart.

The year is 2054. Behind the endless wars is a company called ``EVAC Industry'' that exports weapons all over the world. The United Nations begins negotiations with EI, but EI completely rejects the proposal for a ``total ban on arms imports and exports.''
With no progress being made, the United Nations abandoned negotiations and secretly decided to intervene with force.

The mission is to ``destroy EI's weapons and development facilities'' and ``destroy everything related to UN military intervention.'' Even if the operation is successful, they will not be allowed to return home alive. There were four young people who volunteered for this harsh special mission.

Select an aircraft from two types of teams: TYPE-A (WAY SHOT type) and TYPE-B (LINEAR SHOT type). Normal bullets, lock shots, and bombs. Make full use of 3 types of attack methods and overwhelm the hell of barrage and weapons.

Also supports online rankings for each difficulty level. Take on the world with determination in your chest, even if you're willing to die.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tondemo Nishibuuki 2 - Paris Boutard Rally
description:
Let's go to a retro world with a bubble-era feel! An unusual journey covering a total length of 10,000 miles between Paris and Boutard.

Tondemo Nishibouki 2 Paris-Boutaes Rally is one of the works of the Choicego Computer series, and is a racing action game created in the style of game software released for 8-bit hardware in 1991.

Choha-chan, the main character, has arrived at the western capital, TENJICK, and obtained money and fame. Although he has climbed the ladder of victory at the speed of light, his days are unstimulating. He felt something was missing.

One day, Hacchan is recognized for his driving skills and is entrusted with something by a racer. It was the right to participate in the world's No.1 phantom race, "Paris-Boutard Rally"...!

Use jumps and turbos to step on enemies, climb over cliffs, defeat unique bosses, and aim for victory! Don't miss the story full of bubbly tidbits and the retro-style instruction manual that can be viewed in-game.

The G-Mode website includes instructions to learn how to make 3D glasses that give a 3D view of the screen.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 6 - Tsuikou Saku Jiken
description:
Serial murder case x female secretary disappearance case.
Uncover the hidden truth from two intertwined perspectives.

A series of murders have been occurring mainly in Marihamadai since last year.
Detective Otonari, who is concerned that the victims have no connection with each other and that there is no clue to solving the case, asks his assistant detective Sagishima Izuna to join the police in their investigation.

Meanwhile, scriptwriter Ikuo Masao, who is almost forced to take on work for the detective agency, receives a request from a certain company to search for someone. The woman who is the subject of the investigation, Hamakawa Yumiko, is a contract employee working in the secretarial department. After working for a month, she suddenly becomes unreachable...

Izuna and Ikuo. The two encounter two cases. What is the truth that awaits them at the end?

name: G-Mode Archives+: Danmaku Kentei Shiken - DaiOuJou-hen
description:
Dear Danmaku believers, it's time for a deadly trial. Prove your strength in front of your ever-growing opponent.

Cave's shooting games are all about danmaku.
But how good am I really? A work that answers that question has finally appeared.

This work, "Danmaku Kentai Shikan" is a shooting game that diagnoses your ability to respond to barrage by continuing to fight against opponents who become stronger each time you defeat them.

In this work, which is called ``DaiOuJou-hen'', the brutal bosses of ``DoDonPachi DaiOuJou'' will block your challenge.

In addition to the in-game class evaluation, this game also supports online rankings, so you can further hone your skills by competing with users from all over the world.

Those who are not afraid of death, aim for the top of the barrage.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 8 - Kamen Genei Satsujin Jiken
description:
This is a Switch port of the mobile port of the DS remaster of the first game in the Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan series.

Embraced by illusions, I put on a mask... A mysterious serial murder case intertwines with the virtual world and the real world.

In April 2003, 8 months after the first work in the series, "Masque Fantasy Incident,"
Masao Ikuo, the scenario writer for this game, received an invitation to the beta test for the new network game ``Misty Online.''

``Misty Online'' was Japan's first MMOADV, and it was an unprecedented game in which players and their friends solve incidents that occur in a world that closely resembles a real city.

A response from a player playing the role of a corpse who participated in a beta test with Izuna Sagishima of the Igawa Detective Agency and tried to solve a fictional murder case, butdied after falling from a height. Gone...

Reality and fantasy. present and past. The countless threads intertwined in a complex and mysterious manner create illusions that envelop people's hearts.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 9 - Samidare ha Nibiiro no Shirabe
description: I follow his shadow in the pale dull sky.... Eight years ago, the Kibukawa Detective Agency, another great detective.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 5 - Kurai Hako no Ue
description:
``What's on top of this...? ”
A creepy urban legend turns into a nightmare that erodes reality.

"Late at night, when you call for an elevator on the first floor of a haunted apartment, a ``hako'' slowly descends from the rooftop, which is supposed to be off-limits .

When the elevator reaches the first floor and opens its mouth, the entire interior is dyed in bright red..."

A friend of game scenario writer Masao Ikurumi, a freelance writer who makes a living writing articles on the occult. Mirokuin Renji heads to the apartment building where the urban legend ``Red Elevator'' is believed to have originated.

A strange house full of empty rooms, residents who keep their mouths shut, and the ``incident from eight years ago'' that is said to be cursed if you speak about it.

Mirokuin, who pursues the truth hidden in urban legends, confronts his fear that night.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai - Milky no Yabou
description:
Even if you cheat, if you win you're in the right! If you lose you have to strip! Have a dreamy time exchanging tiles with beautiful girls.

This work, which was previously released on feature phones, is a side story of Jaleco's beautiful girl competition mahjong game "Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai" series.

Milky Pie, an alien in the form of a rabbit's ``Chikyu-Seifuku Project'' begins in earnest!
Seifuku... Seifuku... That means everyone's "uniform" is in danger! ?

Idol mahjong player Suchie-Pai, a self-proclaimed righteous heroine, stands up to face the shameless crisis of the earth! !

Make full use of "loading (cheating)" by consuming points and "Suchie Stick" to draw Tsumo, win the mahjong match with beautiful girls, and steal everyone's "uniform" before Milky Pie. ! !

Enjoy two-player mahjong with reward CG, online rankings, and anything goes.

name: G-Mode Archives 42: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 2 - Tasogare-hen
description:
Suspicious death under the cold sky. Is this a suicide, or...
The second installment of the full-scale mystery adventure series.

The mystery adventure "Izumi Jiken File" series is a mystery adventure game that "deduces the culprit" based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected by interviewing.

The best-selling author "Kagamizuki Masamune" who always goes on a sudden trip, and the new editor "Izumi Kido" who is in charge of it.
Solving the mystery of the code left by Kagamizuki, this time Izumi arrived at Tempozan in Osaka in winter.

But there was another incident there...

A man who drank coffee with sleeping pills and froze to death leaving a suicide note under the cold sky with a temperature of -5℃.

Just before the estimated time of death, she was suddenly told a breakup story from her who was dating, and there is a motive that led to suicide, but Kagamizuki feels uncomfortable with the victim who is said to have moved to the scene of the discovery of the body without wearing a jacket.

Izumi, who took the manuscript hostage again this time, is stubborn as an editor and approaches the truth of the case.

name: Yoshi no Cookie
description: Yoshi no Cookie is a remake of Yoshi's Cookie, only released inside the Nintendo Puzzle Collection for the Nintendo GameCube, only released in Japan.

name: G-Mode Archives 41: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 1 - Shiosai-hen
description:
The mystery adventure "Izumi Jiken File" series is a mystery adventure game that "deduces the culprit" based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected by interviewing.

The main character, "Izumi Kido", is a female editor in charge of the popular novelist "Kagamitsuki Masamune".
After chasing Kagamizuki, who abandoned the manuscript and went on a journey, Izumi arrived in Shonan, the western part of Kanagawa Prefecture.
When Izumi finds Kagamizuki and comes on him, Kagamizuki tells with a mysterious face. " Actually, there was a murder case."

The victim was a 54-year-old company officer, the scene of the incident was under the breakwater of the port, and the cause of death was a head laceration due to a fall.
From the situation at the scene, it looks like an unfortunate accident, but Kagamizuki seems to be convinced that it is a murder.

Taizumi, who took the manuscript, went to the city of Shonan to unravel the truth of the incident.

name: G-Mode Archives 40: Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha
description:
"Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha" is a Japanese-style fantasy RPG that depicts a magnificent story woven by gods and humans on the stage of "The Land of the Sun".

The "God Drop" system, which allows you to use unique secret techniques by possessing the gods yourself, and the "Gogyo Aisei and Soko" system, which changes damage depending on the attributes of the gods and the attributes of enemies, etc., produce strategic battles.

There are also plenty of collection elements such as completing the picture book by meeting monsters and gods, and there are also dungeons that appear only under specific conditions.

In order to stop my brother who fell into darkness, make a contract with the eight million gods in various places and defeat the darkness with the ultimate secret technique!

name: G-Mode Archives 39: Flyhight Cloudia IV - Eien no Kizuna
description:
There is something we must protect with everything we have. We will once again confront the dark clouds of fate that surround us.

Flyhight Claodia series is popular as a full-fledged mobile phone RPG. The latest work "Flyhight Cloudia 4" started to happen one after another in the world "Cloudia". It depicts the mystery of mysterious events and the bonds of the people involved in it.

This work supports the first "wide screen" function of G-MODE Archives. You can enjoy the adventure of the sky on a powerful large screen instead of a conventional square screen.

The combat system adopts multi-weight battles that have been inherited in the series.
In addition to enjoying highly strategic battles with easy operation, a convenient "AUTO" mode is also available. You can enjoy fighting with lower-rated enemies without stress and immerse yourself in the story.

name: G-Mode Archives 38: Mystia2
description:
The second adventure fantasy drawn with gentle colors. The story of the "King's Sword" left by the god of Mystia.

"mystia2" is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Mystia, one year after the previous work "mystia".

In this work, which consists of all three chapters, the party changes for each chapter.
A large volume of scenarios around the "King's Sword" left by the gods and the "Masty Stone" that manipulates the gods
You can enjoy the world view of "mystia" drawn with gentle colors more deeply.

Like the previous work, it is equipped with convenient functions such as a memo function and an automatic save system.

There are also plenty of rushing elements such as the treasure collection system and "from the beginning as it is strong" that comes out after clearing.
Let's use a wide variety of magic and challenge ourselves to fight against monsters who block our way.

name: G-Mode Archives 37: Moe Slot Beach no Shizuku
description:
Beach fairies appear in the slot! Put out the enchanted "777" with your fingers!

"Moe Slot ☆ Beach no Shizuku" is a casino-style authentic slot game that incorporates bonus elements such as "JACK POT" and "FACTOR". During the game, "Shizuku" and "Haruna" of the "Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku" series will appear, and the adult play will be gorgeous and lovely.

A "tutorial" mode that explains the rules in an easy-to-understand manner, which is safe even for beginners, and it can be left alone! Equipped with an "autoplay" function that keeps turning the reels automatically.

If you meet certain conditions, the number of "Haruna" costumes will increase, and you can also enjoy dressing up.

Please enjoy the pleasure of making opportunities and bonuses solid and grabbing a large amount of coins.

name: G-Mode Archives 36: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 3 - Sekai Taikai-hen
description:
The shining midsummer sun stimulates the hearts of the fairies. A beach volleyball festival where 16 beautiful girls dance in the air.

This game is set in Tokyo in 2XX9, one year after the world expedition in the previous work "Flight Edition". Shizuku Asagiri, the captain of the Ao High School beach volleyball club, was practicing hard every day with his junior, Suzu Kamijima. It was a pair of Shizuku & Bells who challenged the preliminary round of the world tournament for the reunion with Shizuku's best friend Haruna, but ...?

In this work, not only new characters, but also nostalgic characters who appeared in past works will participate!
In the competition scene, new actions such as "change of operation character" and "combination technique" are also added.

In the new "World Tour Mode", you can play in pairs with your favorite characters!

Everyone's long-awaited swimsuits and sunburn have also been increased ...! Please enjoy the "Shizuku World" that has evolved more brilliantly and boldly.

name: G-Mode Archives 35: Magical Fantasista II
description:
Lost and in search of "Akashic Records" ...
The second magic synthetic RPG that fights by making use of magic and individuality!

The second installment of the magical synthetic RPG "Magical Fantasista" series.
The three honor students of the Imperial Academy of Magic, Kamui, Mercurius, and Yuturna, were involved in a big incident during the final assignment at the end of the school year and decided to go on an adventure to solve it.

The three of them are good at attribute magic, sword magic, and star magic, each of which has different characteristics, and while synthesizing the magic obtained as a trophy and taking an exam at the dojo, while raising the magic level, they face the crisis of the Nebula country. I'll go.

Dungeons where the terrain changes every time you enter, and the ability equipment system where you can enjoy a wide variety of training are also alive and well.

Enjoy the magnificent world of Magical Fantasista, where many powerful enemies are waiting!

name: G-Mode Archives 34: Majoukko Princess
description:
Mefi, the princess of the devil's castle, was defeated by a hero and lost her place. Let's summon our wisdom, trap humans, and recapture the castle!

The stage of the story is after the ending of a role-playing game... Mefi, the last boss who has been kicked out of the Devil's Castle, aims to revenge on the hateful heroes!

However, there is very little that Mefi, who has lost her magical power, can do.

Let's carry the wooden box placed in the stage to make a scaffolding, and make good use of tricks such as Tsurugiyama and punching gloves to clear it.

When you get orbs and treasure chests that appear on a specific stage, you can recover your demon friends and stolen treasures, and the title screen that was alone also includes the lively elements that change more and more.

Will Mefi be able to regain the demon castle stolen by the hero!?

name: G-Mode Archives 33: Tetris Diamond
description:
When talking about feature phone apps, you can never leave out the G-MODE version of "TETRIS".

The "TETRIS DIAMOND" version, one of the most popular versions of TETRIS, is back as a G-MODE archive!

There are 4 types of game modes included.

Starting with the normal "TETRIS mode", "DIAMOND mode" where you can get a bonus score by erasing the line with "Diamond Tetrimino", and "PUZZLE mode" that erases all lines using limited blocks. There are various rules.

In addition to familiar techniques such as "TETRISTM line erasing" and "T-SPIN", let's aim for a high score by making full use of the new technique "DIAMOND" using "Diamond Tetrimino"!

Please enjoy the glittering world of "TETRIS" that still does not fade.

name: G-Mode Archives 32: Maou Company
description:
The matter of hell also depends on the money!?

An RPG where the demons of the lower class aim for the heavenly world with the power of money.

It is a role-playing game that aims for the heavens with three of his friends, in order to solve the mystery of the item "Pendulum" given to him by his uncle, Loki, a lower-class demon and the main character, is a role-playing game that aims for heaven.

If you save money during the adventure, you can exchange "engagement (contract)" with ancient demons with the power of the pendulum.

You can acquire a variety of "skills" from the demons who have engaged, so let's acquire "skills" according to your purpose and advance the battle with the enemy advantageously!
Also, if you don't understand anything while playing, the explanation will be displayed with one "Navi" button, so beginners in the demon world can also enjoy it with confidence.

name: G-Mode Archives 31: Irekae IQ Crossword DX
description:
Let's replace the letters and align the words!

A new sense of crossword puzzle that makes the pleasure of filling become a habit.

If you know the words that enter each square from the vertical and horizontal hints, replace the letters!

"Irekae IQ Crossword DX" is a crossword puzzle you play by replacing panels.

If multiple words are completed with a single replacement, you will get a high score!
In addition, the player's IQ level is judged according to the time required to clear and the score.
There are three types of game modes: "World Mode" that clears the stage within the time limit, "IQ Test Mode" that determines the player's IQ level, and "Free Mode" that solves problems without worrying about the time limit.

You can participate in each national ranking with your score and IQ index.

name: G-Mode Archives 30: Sorcerian
description:
Action RPG "Sorcerian" that gained popularity as a game for PCs and consumers. This work is a complete port of the mobile app version of "Advanced Sorcerian". Redesigned graphics and a variety of effects will enliven your adventure in the fantasy world.

Players are free to challenge each scenario by creating a party of 4 people from 4 different classes. Each scenario has a lot of mystery-solving and maze elements, and it's very responsive.

Includes "Basic Scenario (Chapter 16)" including tutorials and G-mode original scenarios, and additional scenarios "Sengoku Sorcerian (Chapter 5)" and "Pyramid Sorcerian (Chapter 5)".

With the Sorcerians and your hands, lead a number of stories to a happy ending.

name: G-Mode Archives 28: Sepas Channel
description:
If we lose something one by one,
The world will fall apart.

"Sepas Channel" is an RPG that explores identity.

"What is the meaning of your existence to be recognized by others?" " What is freedom and what is time?"

A boy who lost his memory, a girl who lost his shadow, and a dog looking for a missing owner.
Set in a mysterious world with a sci-fi and fantasy atmosphere, a story surrounding the radio broadcast by the mysterious DJ "Sepaschan" will unfold.

If you use the "channel change" system that holds the key to the game, you can switch the characters and groups you operate.

Please use the range of action and abilities of the main characters and cooperate with each other to advance the story.

name: G-Mode Archives 27: Ninja no Gakko
description:
Train hard to become a full-fledged ninja!

A collection of mini games set in a ninja school.

Players become students at a three-year ninja school, improve their ninjutsu skills through various mini-game-style classes, and take on promotion exams and graduation exams.

You can play 5 types of mini-games, including ``Shuriken Throw'' where you aim at enemies that appear up, down, left and right, and ``Transformation Technique'' where you memorize frog cries in order.

As you advance to the next grade, you will be able to take new classes, and the difficulty level of the previous subjects will also increase!!

There is no limit to the number of classes you can take, so you can take any subject you like as many times as you like, and there are also elements that allow you to complete your career path after graduating from ninja school.

name: G-Mode Archives 26: Ore no Sentai Oranger
description:
I'll make the next hero!
Become the commander of the Hero Squadron and protect the peace on Sunday morning!

"Ore no Sentai Oranger" is a training simulation game that nurtures the hero squadron.

Each of the five members of the squadron has their own personality, age and gender.
In addition to normal physical techniques, I will master "special moves" that make use of my specialty, such as a ike-face attack that shoots the hearts of moms.

The growth of the Oranger was confirmed by the battle with the enemy in the Sunday morning program and sales (children's festival).

Cultivate a squadron according to the fan base, and compete with other heroes for the popularity ranking and aim for the first place.
It's up to you how you enjoy it. Let's grow your favorite squadron!

name: G-Mode Archives 23: Keitai Shoujo
description:
"Keitai Shoujo" is a love simulation game with the aim of making a girlfriend in about 40 days until Christmas with Lin, a girl who became a mobile phone girl.

As you live your daily school life, let's talk to girls, email and date.
At specific events, the PPM (psychedelic pink motion) system that allows you to freely appreciate girls is activated, and the reaction and favorability of girls changes depending on the point of view, and there are also factors such as being reflected in the game.

Please enjoy the pure love story with the five girls who appear.

name: G-Mode Archives 22: Heracles no Eikou III - Kamigami no Chinmoku
description:
"Glory of Heracles" is an RPG based on Greek mythology.
Since the release of the first work "Tojin Makyoden: The Glory of Heracles" in 1987, it is a popular RPG series that has spun stories with a number of hardware, and this work is the best scenario and famous title in the series.

The story is independent of other series works, and you can enjoy it alone.

In a world where day and night change with the passage of time, the people and shops you can meet will change.

While confronting strong enemies while making full use of 7 kinds of characteristic weapons and magic learned in temples in various places, in battles with weak enemies, the characters will fight automatically battle only with striking attacks by switching to auto battle mode, so it's stressful. You can play without it.

name: G-Mode Archives 21: Unou Paradise
description:
I'm snoring in my tired right brain!
Have fun checking the power of the right brain that controls intuition and inspiration.

"Unou Paradise" is a game that fun to play and check the ability of the "right brain" that controls human intuition, inspiration, creativity, and image.

All you need for the operation is 4 buttons, up, down, left and right, and your judgment.
Check the ability of the "right brain" while doing various tasks (games) such as quickly counting the animals in the group within the time limit and instantly choosing the same picture as the example.

There are 8 types of tasks (games) included.
There is an "exam" mode through all assignments and a "practice" mode where you can play only one type of assignment.

name: G-Mode Archives 20: Magical Fantasista
description:
The first in the series of magical synthetic RPG.

In order to avoid the pinch of school withdrawal, Holin, a student of the Magic College, travels on an adventure to clear the challenges in the "Seventh Star System".

The "Seventh Star System" that Holin ventures is made of the Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, and the Sun, and the inside of the dungeon changes every time you enter. At the bottom, there is a boss waiting to see through the task.

Please aim to be a "fantasista" in the magical world by developing various magical effects and skills that Holin herself has hidden, and creating powerful magic freely.

name: G-Mode Archives 18: Hero Must Die. Director's Cut
description:
An innovative RPG produced with Mr. Shoji Masuda for the original draft, scenario, and game design, Shunya Yamashita for character design, and Kenji Ito for music and gorgeous famous creators.
The hero who defeated the demon king and saved the world in exchange for his life went on a journey to find the woman he loved with five days of life expectancy. Time in the game passes according to the action, and as death approaches, the hero gradually loses his power...
A multi-scenario where you can experience new discoveries and new developments every time you play back. You can enjoy it as many times as you want due to the multi-ending where the content of the funeral changes depending on what you do before you live.

name: G-Mode Archives 16: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 2: Hishou-hen
description:
Beach fairies fly to the world!
Take the victory against the world's powerhouses!

The second easy-to-use beach volleyball game in which a cheerful high school girl, Shizuku Asagiri, is active.

One year after the previous work, the "Cinderella Cup" that determines the No.1 in the country...
Shizuku and his partner Haruna will go on a world expedition and challenge powerful players from various countries.
Let's win a hot rally that unfolds with famous places around the world in the background and seize the victory!

In addition to unique characters and gorgeous swimsuits, this work introduces a "tanning system"!
Depending on the swimsuit you are wearing, you will leave healthy sunburn marks on the water.
You can enjoy the combination of swimsuit collection and sunburn marks.

name: G-Mode Archives 12: Night Hike
description:
Night Hike is the second entry in the Senbazuru, or Thousand Paper Cranes, series. In the darkness, an unknown fear attacks you.

"Night Hike'' is an outdoor program that increases people's tolerance for darkness, senses they don't normally use, and a sense of solidarity with others by walking on mountain trails at night without lights.

Keita Iizuka, a budding reporter, is drawn to the unfamiliar term "night hike" and joins an outdoor tour in a deserted camp on the outskirts of the Tokyo metropolitan area.

Scenarios branch through a "choice card" system. An immersive sound production stirs your imagination. In the darkness filled with anxiety and fear, will you be able to welcome the morning again?

name: G-Mode Archives 11: Senbazuru
description:
A horror adventure novel that stimulates the imagination.
What do you pray for with a thousand cranes?

Senbazuru is generally known to be folded for "prayer". However, it is said that it has the aspect of a kind of obsession and a desperate wish...

The main character "Yuichi Sasaki" is an ordinary 26-year-old office worker. One morning, Yuichi receives a call from a hospital called Tsukumo General Hospital, which he had never heard of.

It seems that his lover Mayuri was transported the night before. He hurried to Tsukumo General Hospital, but...

A scenario where you can't predict what happens next, a branching system with "cards" that determines the future of the story.

Let's complete various stories surrounding Yuichi and Mayuri.

name: G-Mode Archives 10: Souhide Series Omatsuri-zukushi
description:
Let's go out for various fairs every season!
A collection of festival mini-games full of nostalgia!

You can enjoy a variety of games such as the festival's classic "goldfish scooping" and "shooting", as well as "smart ball" and "ring throwing" as much as you want.
There are games that can be played other than opening stores, such as "Bon Dancing" at the summer festival and "Mochitsuki" at the spring festival. Let's explore every corner of the shrine throughout the year and play all 10 kinds of mini-games.

The memories of the player playing are written in a diary. I enjoyed shooting... I ate a lot of yakisoba... Let's write a lot of your own thoughts in your diary.

name: Squirmunity: Ballad of the prankmonger
description: Squirmunity is a game detailing the multi-faceted adventures of Cubicle the Cube.

name: Azu-Tama
description: A doujin game in which you can play as Chiyo or Osaka, defending themselves during a snowball fight against other members of the Azumanga Daioh cast.

name: Use Your Psychic Powers at Applebee's
description: You are a Psychic Brand Ambassador for Schtupmeister Beer. Listen to the thoughts of customers at the local Applebee's and convince them to try your syrupy ale. But will being in these peoples' heads convince you to get involved in their lives?

name: Arc Style: Sangokushi Pinball
description:
Arc Style: Sangokushi Pinball is a pinball game set during the Three Kingdoms period in ancient China.

As well as a "Standard" mode where you progress through the stages, it includes a "Boss Attack" mode where you can go head-to-head with the mighty generals of the Three Kingdoms era who fought in "Standard", and "Library" where you can view information about unlocked events and warlords. High scores can be viewed in "Ranking" as well as an online leaderboard.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Deluxe Edition
The Xeno Project II
description:
After fighting your way across Xen and escaping in a rocket, you are captured and imprisoned aboard an Earth vessel full of grunts, lead by the our old friend the G-Man.

What happens next? I’m afraid that’s up to you. Good luck. You’ll need it.

name: Mistake -1
description: Mistake-1 is a half life mod, telling the story of Steve's past and how a murder changed everything.

name: Mistake
description: This mod will let us into a horroristic world in the Andrew Parker asylum and we will live through (or not) in the view of a mental patient. The mod’s primal object is not the insane bloodbath. The real object is to escape from the huge building which holds a lot of secrets.

name: Gachinco Tennis S
description:
Gachinco Tennis S is a tennis battle game with flashy magical ball attacks that can be activated with a single button.

There are 24 characters with different magic and abilities. The game starts with 12 characters and others are unlocked by defeating them in invasion matches after winning in the tournament mode.

The game uses a tag team match with original rules, after selecting 2 characters it plays like a singles match but the characters can swap at any time during a rally. Seize victory by using two types of magic and swap characters depending on the situation.

name: TWHL Tower
description: Back in February 2015, a group project was set up at The Whole Half Life (TWHL). Each mapper would be given a set amount of space in order to create a floor in a tower. The gameplay, appearance and story of each floor is unique, decided by the mapper. After a few months, the final maps were sent to Urby, who linked them together, added a start and end map, and the result was TWHL Tower!

name: TWHL Tower 2
description: TWHL Tower 2 is the follow-up to the collaborative mod TWHL Tower from 2016. A group of regulars at The Whole Half-Life site created a map (or 2, or 3!) that make up the floors in this tower. Each floor has a very small footprint but each has its own unique style, for you to fight/puzzle/sneak through on your way down from the roof. Reach the ground floor and finally escape!

name: Buddy Collection Extra: Kochousou no Kimyou na Go-nin
description: Buddy Collection Extra: Kochousou no Kimyou-na Gonin includes a new scenario titled “The Peculiar Five of Butterfly Manor” that expands upon the main game's story and characters. Along with that, there's now more voiced character dialogue.

name: 1000m Zombie Escape!
description: "1000m Zombie Escape!" is an action game where you "run" away from a bunch of wandering zombies. You have to control a character that is so scared that they can only rotate. Can you make it through the frightening town to the rescue helicopter 1000m away...?

name: Tokeijikake no Apocalypse
description: This is a Japanese visual novel in which the "box of the future" has opened. Follow the protagonist as she continues to search for a bit of happiness repeated time.

name: Fancy Birds
description: Fancy Birds is a side-scrolling, mobile game where birds that fly through levels while avoiding obstacles to earn their spot as “the fanciest bird in the nest”.

name: Japanese Escape Games: Haikousha kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Nekosama Escape: Neko-sama no Amamidokoro no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Tobira no nai Heya kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Chika Keimusho kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Ganjou na Tobira no Heya kara no Dasshutsu
description:
You wake up in a room you don't recognize.

The only way in or out is blocked by a sturdy door.

name: Japanese Escape Games: Crossed Circle kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Hikari to Kagami no Aida kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Karakuri Keimusho kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Kimyou na Iseki kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Omoide no Bokou kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Toy House kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Strange Museum kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Renpou Keimusho kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Strange Park kara no Dasshutsu
Japanese Escape Games: Atelier Kissa Furatto kara no Dasshutsu
Chou Hakai Keikaku kara no Dasshutsu
Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
description:
A remaster of Castlevania: Symphony of the Night included in the "Castlevania Requiem" collection.

Experience Symphony of the Night remastered to 4K/1080p, with optional rendering options such as image-smoothing. This remaster is based on Symphony of the Night's expanded re-release for Castlevania: The Dracula X Chronicles.

Featuring ground-breaking non-linear gameplay, Symphony of the Night helped define a new genre of gameplay by blending RPG elements, exploration and platforming. The vast number of weapons and items found throughout the game allows a diverse range of play styles to be employed. This game perfected the essence of the Castlevania series with gorgeous artwork and classic soundtrack that carry the player through the game.

name: Castlevania: Rondo of Blood
description:
A remaster of Castlevania: Rondo of Blood included in the "Castlevania Requiem" collection.

Experience Rondo of Blood remastered to 4K/1080p resolution, with optional rendering options such as image-smoothing. This remaster is based on the English-localization of Rondo of Blood, which was previously released exclusively as part of its remake, Castlevania: The Dracula X Chronicles.

Venture through 9 stages featuring hidden levels and alternative routes to save imprisoned villagers as you set out to destroy count Dracula once and for all.

Playable characters include Richter Belmont the Vampire Hunter and Maria Renard the master of the 4 celestial beasts.

name: Find it! Mr. Pict of the Emergency Exit
Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Quest
Touch Detective 3 + The Complete Case Files
description:
This jam-packed collection features Touch Detective 3, the biggest and best point-and-click adventure of junior detective Mackenzie and her faithful sidekick Funghi, playable in English for the first time. With the arrival in town of the highly competitive detective Norman Touche, the pressure's on Mackenzie to solve cases before her rival does!

Touch Detective 3 + The Complete Case Files also includes the entire original Touch Detective and Touch Detective 2½ games, plus two bonus cases starring Funghi and an extensive museum of artwork and music from the entire Touch Detective series. Help Mackenzie and her friends as they search for clues, interview suspects and get to the bottom of one zany mystery after another!

name: Minna no! Shougakusei aru aru Sagashi: Kokomo mo Otona mo Tanoshimeru Irasuto Quiz no Tore Game
No Man's Sky: Living Ship
description: Explore space from a different perspective with the Living Ship update. Introducing a new class of biological ship, a new story mission, mysterious space encounters, space NPCs and more.

name: Melkis: Spend With You the Sweet Days Like Fairy Tales
Engawa Danshi to Kemono Tan
description: Engawa Danshi to Kemono Tan is a romance simulation game developed by GANBARION Co.

name: Sangoku Rensenki: Omoide Gaeshi + Gakuen Rensenki
Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: Let's Go!! Daily Life from RisingBeat
Q Remastered
description: This game "Q Remastered" is a simple puzzle game that anyone can enjoy! You can freely draw lines and shapes on the screen. The drawn object will fall down due to gravity. You will use the object to solve more than 1200 missions. Can you get the ball out of the cup? Let's challenge!

name: Omoshiro Action: Ii Otona-tachi no Daibouken
Kaminazo: Mirai kara no Omoi de
description:
A new experience. Using paper.

Kaminazo: Mirai kara no Omoi de is a puzzle game that uses paper. Solve the puzzles in the game by taking notes on, folding, and cutting self-printed puzzle paper.

Enjoy solving puzzles through various stages that use paper such as letters, origami, photographs, maps, and leaflets.

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy - Digital Deluxe Edition
Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV with Power Up Kit: Digital Deluxe Edition
Poly Memory: Furries
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with furries.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Scar's Kingdom
description: The first major content update for Disney Dreamlight Valley is here! Meet and team up with one of the Pride Land’s most well-known villains, Scar, to bring back the Sunlit Plateau to a green and vibrant state. Open the new Star Path and progress your way through to unlock tons of new cosmetics to help you express your villainous side.

name: The Sims 5
description: Project Rene is the working title for a "next generation Sims game," widely speculated in the Sims community to be The Sims 5. Project Rene was officially unveiled during Electronic Arts's "Behind The Sims" summit on October 18, 2022 by Lyndsay Pearson, Vice President of Franchise Creative for The Sims team.

name: Island_Name_Here
description: Play as the developer of a tropical island game in this unique puzzle adventure! Edit various object properties to achieve your goals and unlock more of the story. Experiment, undo, and repeat; no action is irreversible. Flex your creative skills to make an experience that is entirely your own!

name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey
description: This version is included in the Dragon Quest Monsters 1+2 and features updated graphics and a new interface.

name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure
description: This version is included in the Dragon Quest Monsters 1+2 and features updated graphics and a new interface.

name: Miko Monogatari!
description: "Miko Monogatari!" is a medium-length novel game. You develop your character in the game. It was created in 2022 by "R Man 44".

name: Super Mario World: Bowser's Return
description: A fanmade ROM hack of Super Mario World, featuring new level design and a total of 54 exits.

name: Donkey Kong 5: The Journey of Over Time and Space
description: Donkey Kong 5: The Journey of Over Time and Space is a bootleg game for the Game Boy Color. It is a clone of Super Mario Bros. Deluxe, also released for the Game Boy Color (but it is not a hack).

name: Detective Solitaire: The Ghost Agency 2
description: Do you like solitaire games? Do you like to solve mysterious riddles, examine clues and catch dangerous criminals, or maybe you have always dreamed of joining the Ghost Agency? Then this game will not leave you indifferent!

name: O-Sim 22
description: An orienteering simulator for all runners who want to test their skills digitally and for those who want to try the sport once.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Raven Collector's Edition
description: The renowned archaeologist Alan Dillinger is dead, seemingly by his own hand. At his side is a note detailing his love for a woman named Lenore. It seems to be a simple case of romance gone wrong. But the mysterious client who summoned you isn't so sure. He believes Alan was murdered! And he's not the only one. Join the brilliant detective Dupin and dive into a world of lies, betrayal, and revenge. You'll soon find yourself on the trail of the enigmatic White Crow, who takes a more deadly approach to solving the case. Can you uncover the truth? Find out in this chilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Songs for a Hero
description: Songs for a Hero is a Super Mario World ROM hack inspired by the original game by Castro Brothers and Dumativa, with the story of a Hero in search of saving the Princess from the dangers that surround them. There are 25 exits, with bosses, graphics and custom music, with a retry system.

name: Hentai Sexy Nurses
description: Hentai Sexy Nurses is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Silence Coffee Shop
description: Silence Coffee Shop is a JRPG where you'll act as a regular customer. Unveil the truth of Silence Coffee Shop behind it conflicting rules.

name: Mittin
description: Mittin is a library of dynamic modules which foster the development of independent living skills in the home and community. Designed to support special education transition-related instruction, these virtual resources are free and available to parents, schools, educators, and students in Michigan.

name: Half-Life: The Evasion
description:
Playing as Adrian Shephard set shortly after the nuclear bomb that devastated the Black Mesa Research Facility. You find yourself on a Xen “island” being kept out of harms way.

Fortunately, you have managed to contact a scientist back on Earth and he can help you return. Whether that’s a good thing only time will tell!

name: Futanari Sex: Unexpected Roomate
description: An explicit erotic visual novel about two attractive roommates sharing an apartment. Everything takes a turn when Ava finds out what Mila is actually hiding in her panties.

name: Great Toilet Simulator
description: Great Toilet Simulator is a first-person indie horror telling you the story of a man who has his car broken on his way home, in the middle of a thick forest. What makes the situation even worse is that the main character is really in need of a toilet.

name: Yo-Kai Watch 3: Tempura
description: Third game of the main series of Yo-kai Watch video games. It was initially released in two versions, Sushi and Tempura. The player switches control between 2 characters, one in Japan and the other in the USA.

name: Hoppe-chan Minna de Odekake! Waku-waku Hoppe Land!!
G-man Invasion
description: The G-Men are everywhere! They're invading out dear planet are trying to kill you, kill me, kill everyone! It's your job to stop them!

name: Chemical Existence
description: Chemical Existence puts you in the role of Reece Max whom simply is in the wrong place at the wrong time. He gets mixed up with fighting gangs, evil corporations and mutated creatures…

name: X.E.T. Xen Exploration Team
description: You take you on the roll of XET member Bill Freeman. XET is supposed to be the survey team mentioned late in the game and in parts of Blue-Shift. You will visit new parts of Black Mesa and old parts of it; you will, of course, also visit Xen.

name: Hello Kitty to Sekai Ryokou! Ironna Kuni he Odekake Shimashou!
Cho-ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi de Violin Lesson
Resident Evil: Cold Blood
description: Cold Blood is an online story driven coop mod based in the Resident Evil universe. You'll come across many areas from the games, plus a few original areas you'll have never seen before. Using weapons you thought you'd never use, you'll dispatch dozens of different kinds of monsters from Hunters to Giant Spiders to our favorite deadites, zombies.

name: Sudoku to 3-Tsu no Puzzle: Nikoli no Puzzle Variety
Half-Life: Military Duty
description: You're Alexander Shepard - Corporal and a soldier of the Hazardous Environment Combat Unit. You don't know exactly what's going on. But orders came in to pack up everything and head out for a highly classified mission. The destination - Black Mesa research facility. Nobody knows for sure what has happened down there but you will find out soon enough.

name: Dopusk 31
description: Once a simple and frostbitten Moscow digger, wanted to find a special place, is an old shelter to number 31, TK he climbed all the available underground location. After a long search and the Internet, the location of the object 31, in the end, he Founded Path Transportation go through the rails in the subway, through the ventilation in the subway. As soon as he got into unknown lab in his eyes happened to PE, as later proved scientists have tried to reveal the material of an unknown object, discovered recently and brought here from Antarctica.

name: Dead Sector
description: The year is July 18th, 1993, off the coast of Britain to the North East, there is an island that had a dark secret. A terrible epidemic had started to occur only, but a few months ago. A horrendous and violent infection had began to spread all across the island attacking anything or anyone in it's path with tremendous speed and savage force leaving few survivors in it's wake.

name: Ittle Dew no Densetsu: Ushinawareta Reta Shima to Nazo no Shiro
Minna de Uchuu Tour: ChariSou DX2
Itsu no Ma ni Koukan Nikki
Poop Killer
description:
A killer who kills people who shit and don't flush... Jhon is working night shifts at a vhs tape store. After a customer clogs the toilet with poop... the poop killer will chase Jhon.

Don't forget to flush!

name: Half-Life: The Core
description: Half-Life: The Core is a classic retelling of the events surrounding the Resonance Cascade disaster from a new perspective; that of Engineer Maurice Andrews.

name: Half-Life: Intolerable Threat
description: As Gordon Freeman, you must face down the Administrator for the last time. The Administrator has taken control of "HANGAR 16" a government command and control facility in the desert. From here he is possibly planning a coup against the government of the United States, and vengeance against those who have opposed him in the past. You need to meet with an agent who has the access codes to enter the heavily guarded base, infiltrate it and prepare the way for friendly forces to attack.

name: Nintendogs + Cats: Shiba Inu & New Friends
description: One of the versions of Nintendogs + Cats. This version was only released in Japan and China, being replaced by Golden Retriver & New Friends worldwide.

name: PachiPara 3D: Taikai Monogatari 2 - Pachi Pro Fuuunroku Hana: Kibou to Uragiri no Gakuen Seikatsu
Inoue Mami: Kono Hoshi ni Tatta Hitori no Kimi
Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition
description: Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition is a project of enhancement packages that makes the PC version of Silent Hill 2 compatible with modern hardware and playable in widescreen aspect ratios, while improving visuals, audio, and bugs. Examples of what Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition provides are: The use of a widescreen camera; high definition resolutions; upscaled fonts and 2D images; PlayStation 2 quality audio, fog, and shadows; restored post-processing effects; better controller support; and much more. Made by a collaborative team of programmers, modders, and artistse.

name: Yoru no Majin to Ikusa no Kuni: Samayoeru Vampire
description: Yoru no Majin to Ikusa no Kuni: Samayoeru Vampire is an Action game, developed and published by Poisoft, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Escape Academy: Escape From Anti-Escape Island
description: After surviving an eventful first year at the Academy, it’s time for a well-earned summer vacation! But when the Escape Jet is shot down over an uncharted island, relaxation turns to mayhem in this outlandish Escape Academy DLC! Escape from Anti-Escape Island includes 5 brand new escape room levels, an exciting new narrative, and more original music from doseone!

name: Chibi Devi! 2: Mahou no Yume Ehon
Silent Hill 2
description: Investigating a letter from his late wife, James returns to where they made so many memories - Silent Hill. What he finds is a ghost town, prowled by disturbing monsters and cloaked in deep fog. Confront the monsters, solve puzzles, and search for traces of your wife in this remake of Silent Hill 2.

name: Silent Hill: Townfall
description: Silent Hill: Townfall is an upcoming horror game developed by No Code, and published by Annapurna Interactive and Konami Digital Entertainment. It is a spin-off of the Silent Hill franchise, intended to launch an anthology series from various creatives, co-produced by Annapurna.

name: Silent Hill f
description: Silent Hill f is an upcoming game with a completely new story set in 1960's Japan featuring a beautiful, yet horrifying world.

name: The Mysterious Mine Bouncin' Back Edition
description: This is the author’s Earthbound hack that they have worked on since 2006. This hack is a graphics, story, gameplay change hack.

name: Final Fantasy Tactics Advanced Battle
description:
Final Fantasy Tactics Advanced Battle is a hack that brings monster taming to Final Fantasy Tactics Advance, and makes the whole experience centered around this mechanic.

The player can use a new item (the Capture Orb) to capture monsters which (unlike in the vanilla game) join the party and fight on your side. Additionally, all ways to get new humanoid party members have been disabled, the player needs to make do with only monsters and the two starting humanoid party members.

A new system to learn abilities is implemented, similarly to the original Final Fantasy Tactics the units will earn JP which they can spend directly on purchasing abilities. This is the only way the player has to teach new abilities to the monsters.

name: Castlevania: The Last Tear
description: A brand new Castlevania Hack, all to be discovered with new beautiful graphics, new levels and new music

name: Azumanga RPG
description: A dungeon crawler game starring Chiyo from Azumanga Daioh. She attacks by walking into enemies.

name: Spiritwell
description: Play as a child who stumbles across a well and falls into a strange world of spirits...

name: Guidance
description:
Guidance is a uniquely meta, and story focused retro RPG.

Players guide verity and her friends on a journey to seal the gateways to the unseen plane and restore reality to it's former state.

name: To Aerthen
description: To Aerthen is a 8-bit turn based RPG inspired by the old NES Final Fantasy games

name: Colorless Kaina
description:
I, the main character, witnessed the murder of a boy, "Kaina", a serial killer, and Kaina took a liking to me and forced me to interact with him.
What awaits me after 30 days of interaction with him, is it destruction? Or is it just another day?

name: Colecionador Show do Milhão
description: Colecionador Show do Milhão is a bundle that compiles all the first four games on PC.

name: Dungeon in a Bottle
description:
Dungeon in a Bottle is a precision platformer about choosing the right kind of jump in claustrophobic situations.

The acrobatic thief, Reya, has gotten himself trapped in a magic bottle, and now he must use every jump at his disposal to escape the treacherous dungeon within! Hopefully he'll grab some treasure while he's at it.

Perform difficult jumps while getting crushed by spikes, smashed by walls, and dissolved in goop in this platformer that takes the genre in a unique direction.

name: Death in the Water 2
description: Dodge and carve your way through swarms of terrifying sea creatures controlled by Death, a vicious giant mind-controlling Kraken that haunts your every move. Scavenge for hidden treasure to unlock weapons, and upgrades to help you in your fight for survival. Every dive reveals a new nightmare.

name: Chiyo-chan's Key
description: Chiyo-chan's Key is heavily based on Solomon's key, a game developed by Tecmo in 1986. The goal is the same: grab the key and reach the goal while avoiding obstacles.

name: Bike Rider DX3: Time Rider
description: Bike Rider DX3: Time Rider is a single-button platforming game, released only in Japan via the Nintendo 3DS eShop in 2014.

name: Sympathy Kiss
description: Sympathy Kiss is an otome game by Otomate that involves the heroine who was working for almost a year at an app development company and was used to the usual mediocrity of work. However, she is suddenly reassigned to the production department of an app that is about to end its service. She has to choose the ideal partner that will keep the app alive for years to come. Just what awaits her–?!

name: Meitantei Pikachu: Shin Konbi Tanjou
description: Meitantei Pikachu: Shin Konbi Tanjou (Great Detective Pikachu: Birth of a New Duo) was released exclusively in Japan on February 3, 2016 on the Nintendo eShop featuring the first three chapters of what would later be internationally released as Detective Pikachu. From January 27, 2016 to February 29, 2016, the game could be purchased in Japan for ¥1,200, instead of the normal price of ¥1,500. Players who purchased Birth of a New Duo were able to receive a ¥1,500 discount on the full Detective Pikachu game until April 22, 2018.
