The game was removed from the eShop on January 12, 2018, just before the announcement of the full version.

name: Mononoke Tantei: Nobuta no Ayakashi Jikenbo
Touch Detective 3
description: The mystery solving duo, Mackenzie and Funghi, return once again in a new adventure on the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Imi ga Wakaru to Kowai Mystery
Chickip Dancers: Nori-nori Dance de Kokoro mo Odoru
Aqi 155
description: A report on the state of the planet.

name: Gensou Shoujo Wars: Dream of the Stray Dreamer
Asonde Mahjong ga Tsuyoku Naru! Ginsei Mahjong DX
description:
Have fun and learn Mahjong!

You can learn the basic rules and how to play in the "Mahjong Classroom," and you can play against 20 unique opponents in the "Game" mode, which has plenty of support features for beginners. Have fun while you get stronger!

name: Saikyo no Mahjong: 100 Mannin no Tame no Mahjong Dojo
Dasshutsu Adventure: Dai Nana no Yogen
Dasshutsu Adventure: Shuuen no Kuroi Kiri
Dasshutsu Seijin!? Deru Deru Deru de
Dasshutsu Adventure: Shiawase no Akai Ishi
Dasshutsu Adventure: Majo no Sumu Yakata
Dasshutsu Adventure: Akumu no Shinigami Ressha
Nazotoki no Jikan: Thrill Suspense na Nazotoki Dasshutsu Mystery Suiri Game
Arcade Archives: Touki Denshou Angel Eyes
description:
The player must win fierce battles against powerful opponents for the title of "Archangel".
You can use super special moves and special techniques to gain an advantage in battle when your emotional gauge reaches its peak.

name: Stardust League
description: Play the world's first e-sport-ready anime game! Action-packed PVP with beautiful customizable characters, skills & weapons.

name: Manga-ka Debut Monogatari: Suteki na Manga wo Egakou
description: Manga-ka Debut Monogatari: Suteki na Manga o Egakou is a 3DS game, developed and published by Nippon Columbia, which was released in Japan in 2017.

name: Metal Ninja
description:
Stop the time, and Go.
New style 2D scrolling action game.
Ninja who came from 2036 to save the world.

name: Halloween Shooter
description: A fun, classic, first-person shooter with a Halloween theme.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Core + Taito & Sega Packs
description:
Burst into the depths of parallel space!
New combatants join the fray!

name: Ruku's Heart Balloon
description: A cute adventure story about a rabbit, Ruku, and a cat, Lish, just like in a picture book. Make a "heart balloon" with the flower puzzle. How far can you fly in the sky?

name: Suichara: Sweets Chara Mode - Sweets Gakkou he Youkoso!
Kawaii Pet to Kurasou! Wan Nyan & Mini Mini Animal
Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan - Cute na Goma-chi Ippai Puzzle
Radirgy De Gojaru!
description: This Radirgy spinoff takes the series in a new direction by mashing up the original game's shooter gameplay with tower defense.

name: Dragon Quest X: All In One Package - Versions 1-6
description: A new all-in-one package featuring versions 1 to 6 of Dragon Quest X Online.

name: Castlevania: Circle of the Moon
description:
A port of Castlevania: Circle of the Moon included in "Castlevania Advance Collection."

In Circle of the Moon, you can combine action and attribute cards to create over 80 unique spell effects, ranging from fire whips to ice blizzards, with the "Dual Set-up System."

New Quality-of-Life features for this port are included, such as Rewind, Quick Save, and Record/Replay. The new Encyclopedia feature offers helpful information that helps you keep track of items, equipment, enemies, and the Dual Set-up System. With the new DSS Gadget option, you can get on-screen pop-ups that display the DSS Attribute & Action cards that are obtainable from the monsters you encounter in battle.

The story follows Nathan Graves, a vampire hunter apprentice who enters Dracula's Castle along with his Master in order to prevent the dreaded return of the Count.

name: Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance
description:
A port of Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance included in "Castlevania Advance Collection."

Harmony of Dissonance introduced a lot of new features to the franchise, such as "Boss Rush" mode and the "Spell Fusion System" that lets players combine Sub-Weapons with Spell Books to cast devastating spells.

New Quality-of-Life features for this port are included, such as Rewind, Quick Save, and Record/Replay. The new Encyclopedia feature offers helpful information that helps you keep track of items, equipment, enemies, and the Spell Fusion System. With the new Collection Gadget option, you can get on-screen pop-ups that display the obtainable collection items in the current area.

Play as Juste Belmont, the grandson of legendary Vampire Hunter Simon Belmont!

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow
description:
A port of Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow included in "Castlevania Advance Collection."

Aria of Sorrow introduced a brand new attack system called "Tactical Souls," that lets Soma Cruz capture the souls of slain monsters to acquire their abilities (100+ abilities in total). Aria of Sorrow also has a ton of New Game+ content.

New Quality-of-Life features for this port are included, such as Rewind, Quick Save, and Record/Replay. The new Encyclopedia feature offers helpful information that helps you keep track of items, equipment, enemies, and the Tactical Souls System. With the new Soul Gadget option, you can get on-screen pop-ups that display whether or not a soul has been obtained every time you defeat a monster.

Soma Cruz, a young high school exchange student in Japan, is somehow involved in the eternal cycle of reincarnation of the Dark Lord himself. What role does Soma play in all of this? Will he be able to return to his own world?

name: Day Hard
description: Day Hard is a single player adventure set before the events narrated in Half-Life 2. You play as Gordon’s brother, Morgan Freeman. One day Morgan finds the Combines knocking at his door: from then on, it will be a constant fight for survival (We hired Wilbur Smith to write this script).

name: Strider Mountain
description:
AT 30,000 FEET… you are almost 6 miles (9.7 kilometers) above sea level. The human body is not made for these conditions. Temperatures are can plummet to -60F (-51C), the brain is starved for oxygen and each step is a new experience in pure agony.

It’s difficult to breathe. It’s difficult to think. It’s difficult to move. And you still have to endure another 444 feet (0.14 kilometers) to get to the peak. So much for the good news.

name: Mistake of Pythagoras
description:
Mistake of Pythagoras is a modification for Half-Life 2, developed by Koumei Satou.

Something goes mad because the human race failed in the experiment, and it connects with another world.

The resident in the another world is crazy due to the mistake. We should restore the situation.

name: Combine Destiny
description: Rebels have made a base at the top of a mountain near a town called Coonersville. The Combine decided to send Headcrab canisters into the town instead of trying a normal assault and possibly wasting Combine lives and resources. After a suitable period of time to allow the Headcrabs to do their work, a sweeper team is sent in to secure the town and capture the base.

name: Castlevania: Dracula X
description:
A port of Castlevania: Dracula X included in "Castlevania Advance Collection."

Fight your way through Dracula's Castle and defeat the toughest enemies with the new special attack "Item Crash"!

Castlevania: Dracula X is a reimagining of the cult action game Castlevania: Rondo of Blood, and has been acclaimed as one of the most challenging Castlevania titles ever created.

New Quality-of-Life features for this port are included, such as Rewind, Quick Save, and Record/Replay.

The Dark Lord Count Dracula rises again from the dead to revive the forces of darkness and to annihilate this corrupted world and create a new one.
You are Richter Belmont, heir of the Belmont family, and you set out for Dracula's Castle to defeat its evil master.

name: Bonbonribbon: Tokimeki Coord Kirakira Dance
description:
A rhythm game where you can enjoy the coordination and dance of the fashionable dance team "Lily Bonbons".

In addition to the official song "Miracle Ribon", dance to well-known nursery rhymes and classic classics.

name: No Man's Sky: Synthesis
description: The Synthesis Update introduces a number of frequently-requested features and improvements to No Man’s Sky Beyond. Alongside these new features are a large number of community-led quality of life improvements, as well as general polish.

name: Osyaberi! Horijyo! Gekihori: Anna Holinski Saves the Universe, Alright?!
description: Spiral into the galaxy to save the world’s treasures – alone or with a friend!

name: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Kankuu All Stars
Motto Kigaru ni! Oekaki Koubou Plus
Dangerous Ji-San to 1000-nin no Otomodachi Yokoshima
Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask Plus
description: An improved version of the game only available in Japan as a download through the Nintendo eShop. This version contains new animations and puzzles, additional save slots (the original Japanese version has only one), as well as hints for the Akbadain ruins.

name: Nankou Furaku Sangokuden: Wu to Taiga no Eisha
Kumamon Bomber Puzzle de Kumamon Taisou
Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari 2
description: Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari 2 is a 3DS game where you play as a nurse.

name: Dotabata Chouri Akushon IT-kei Ramen Dorasu
Carl jii-san no Sora Tobu Ie
Nicola Kanshuu: Model Oshare Audition Platina
description:
Create your own character and work as an editor for the real Japanese teen fashion magazine "Nicola”. Pick out outfits, take photos, and make it all look perfect for print! Aim to become the best!

The 3DS edition of a larger series. Japan exclusive.

name: Future Card Buddyfight: Yuujou no Bakunetsu Fight!
Nikoli no Sudoku 3D: 8-tsu no Puzzle de 1000-mon
World Eternal Online
description: Player-driven Sandbox MMO featuring Massive Raid Boss Battles, Guilds, and Territorial PvP

name: Spinfrog: All Aboard the Frogcopter
description: Action-Puzzle game from the makers of Bonito Days. Guide the spinning frog stick around top down environments, in a relaxing but challenging Kururin-like.

name: Nankou Furaku Sangokuden: Shoku to Toki no Dou Jaku
DoraMoji: Nobita no Kanji Daisakusen
description: Educational game which focuses on written hiragana and kanji characters. Monsters are confronted by writing hiragana and kanji accurately in order to score an increased number of hit points. The written characters encountered vary with level selection, from "infant" to "6th grade."

name: Puyo Puyo Tsuu
description: Game Gear port of Puyo Puyo Tsuu.

name: Nikoli no Sudoku 3D: 8-tsu no Puzzle de 1000-mon
Meiga to Tanoshimu Otona no Machigai Sagashi
Yowamushi Pedal Ashita he no Kou Kaiten
Earth Defense Force 2 for Nintendo Switch
Silent Hill 2
description: This version of Silent Hill 2 is a remaster included in the Silent Hill HD Collection. The graphics have been re-mastered to 720p, the in-game voice-over was updated along with a re-mastering of the soundtrack and achievements/trophies were added.

name: Silent Hill 3
description: This version of Silent Hill 3 is a remaster included in the Silent Hill HD Collection. The graphics have been re-mastered to 720p, the in-game voice-over was updated along with a re-mastering of the soundtrack and achievements/trophies were added.

name: Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!!
Fiend Folio: Reheated
description: A fan made expansion mod for The Binding of Isaac: Rebrith that overhauls the game's floors, adds over 500 new enemies, 23 new bosses, 2 new characters and plenty of new items!

name: Boku ha Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Haneda All Stars
Azumanga: The Fighting T-Style
description: A doujin fighting game based on the Azumanga Daioh anime and manga series. There are 4 characters: Chiyo, Osaka, Kimura, and Chiyo-chichi.

name: Metal Fight Beyblade: 4D x Zero-G Ultimate Tournament
Raishi
description: A strategy game released for PS Vita and 3DS.

name: Ninja Gaiden: Master Collection - Version D
Prison Architect: Nintendo Switch Edition - Bundle
Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Deluxe Edition
Lily: Shiroki Yuri no Otome-tachi S
Rilakkuma Nakayoshi Collection
description: Spend a relaxing time with Rilakkuma.

name: Nashijiru Action! Funassyi no Yukai na Ohanassyi
Bokura no Nanokakan Sensou: Yuujou Adventure
Dakkan Shirei Majo Dungeon: Nushi to Tamenara Yaraneba Narumai
New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs - Powered-Up
description: A remake of New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs which aims to polish the original hack by improving the level design and giving more replay value.

name: Thomas to Asonde Oboeru Kotoba to Kazu to ABC
Choco-ken no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe
description: Choko Inu no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe is a game for the Nintendo 3DS by Nippon Columbia.

name: Nico Puchi Girls Runway
description: Aim to become the top model at Nico☆Petit Academy in this fashion game based off the magazine "Nico☆Petit"

name: Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero 3D New Chitose with JAL
Shokugeki no Soma: Yuujou to Kizuna no Hitosara
Megami Meguri
description:
Megami Meguri is a IC Card-compatible free-to-play game developed by Capcom for the 3DS with item-based micro-transactions, It was released exclusively in Japan on December 8, 2016. The service ended on September 30th, 2020.

The game was designed to work with Japanese train passes. It focused on Tsukomo, a novice goddess. As players go from station to station, they partake in various events to help Tsukomo become a proper goddess.

name: Bokura no Gakkou Sensou: Tsuukai Adventure
Neko Neko Nihonshi: Rekishi Hakken Puzzle!
Rilu Rilu Fairilu Kirakira: Hajimete no Fairilu Magic
Wan Nyan Dobutsu Byouin: Suteki na Juui-San ni Narou!
Go! Princess PreCure: Sugar Oukoku to 6-nin no Princess!
description: A puzzle game featuring characters from the "Go! Princess Precure" anime series.

name: AzuFight: Taisen Shiyo
description: AzuFight: Taisen Shiyo is a doujin fighting game based on the Azumanga Daioh anime and manga series. Not to be confused with Azumanga The Fighter T-Style, though possibly meant to serve as a sequel or expansion.

name: Future Card Buddyfight Mezase! Buddy Champion!
Miracle Tunes! Game de Tune Up! Da Pun!
Future Card Buddyfight: Tanjou! Oretachi no Saikyou Buddy!
Biyoushi Debut Monogatari: Top Sutairisuto wo Mezasou!
description: Become a coveted beautician and have a hands-on experience!

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Joumou Denki Tetsudou-hen
description: A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series for the Nintendo 3DS, exclusive to Japan. In this entry, you can operate the Joumou Electric Railway's "700" and "Deha 100" train models through a 50.4 km round trip from Chuo Maebashi Station to Nishi Kiryu Station, on Joumou Railway's Joumou Line.

name: Oh! Gacchiman Kyuukyoku no Omega Chinpou to Momige 26
Hero of Aethric
description:
Hero of Aethric: An Orna RPG is a nostalgic turn-based RPG experience where players can go it alone or team up with their friends to adventure through the lands of Aethric.

A blend of new and old, players will experience a nostalgic turn-based battle system with modern day functionality and build-crafting. Explore, battle and loot your way to become the Hero of Aethric.

name: Solomon's Ring: Kaze no Shou
description: Otome game by Plan Peace for PSP.

name: Solomon's Ring: Mizu no Shou
description: Part of the Solomon's Ring series.

name: Solomon's Ring: Chi no Shou
description: Part of the Solomon's Ring series.

name: Juuzaengi: Engetsu Sangokuden
description: Juuzaengi: Engetsu Sangokuden is an otome game, developed by RED Entertainment and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Resident Evil 4: Deluxe Edition
description: Comes with the base game, as well as bonus costumes, deluxe weapons, a treasure map, in-game sunglasses, and the option to swap to the original version of the game's soundtrack.

name: Resident Evil 4: Collector's Edition
description: A physical-only edition containing the Deluxe Edition of the game in a steelbook, digital soundtrack, figure, artbook, poster, and box.

name: Juuzaengi: Engetsu Sangokuden 2
description: A sequel to Juuzaengi: Engetsu Sangokuden.

name: Hanaoni: Yume no Tsuzuki
description: This is the fandisk to Hanaoni.

name: Resident Evil Village: Winters' Expansion - Cloud Version
description: This expansion adds third person mode to the main campaign, new playable characters and stages to Mercenaries mode, and a story continuation called Shadows of Rose.

name: The Citizen Returns
description:
The Citizen Returns is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two, created by Accidental Games.

Set in both the heart and outside of City 17, “The Citizen Returns” contains the final chapters of our citizen’s story, as well as an updated version of Part II.

The setting takes place after Larry have been rescued by the Resistance of you after risking your life. Part 2 and 3 have been merged into a single part after the final release. Part 2's ending (the collapse of the ceiling) has been retconned, now Larry and the protagonist are just running out.

name: Azu-Race Taisen Battle He-Cho
description: A doujin racing game akin to Mario Kart featuring the cast of Azumanga Daioh.

name: Aether: Trading Card Game
description:
Aether: Trading Card Game is an exhilarating online competitive game that seamlessly blends strategy and fantasy. Engage in 1-on-1 duels with other players or AI opponents, utilizing a unique set of Adventurers, spells, and creatures. Each match is a race to defeat the enemy Adventurer, creating a fast-paced and intense gaming experience.

Every Adventurer in Aether is carefully crafted, each possessing a distinctive design and playstyle. They are not just a character, but a portal to a unique set of creatures, spells, and Relics, offering a multitude of strategic paths. You can summon creatures onto the battlefield to fight for you, or equip powerful Relics to gain the upper hand and dive directly into the fray.

name: Parking Master Multiplayer 2
description: Finally, Parking Master Multiplayer 2 is here! All in one: Multiplayer, open-world, next-gen graphics and real car parking experience.

name: No Man's Sky: Beyond
description:
Update 2.0, Beyond, massively expands the multiplayer experience introduced in NEXT, takes immersion to a whole new level with fully-fledged Virtual Reality, overhauls base building, NPCs, technology trees, and much, much more.

Marking the three year anniversary of No Man’s Sky, this is our largest update so far, broadening the experience across the entire game.

Our journey continues.

name: Sonic & Ashuro
description: Sonic the Hedgehog & Ashuro is an awesome ROM hack based on the classic Sonic the Hedgehog. Created by Ashuro from SSRG (Drakughost), the game features 2 characters and 2 universes on one single screen. The game features custom and special stages with 3 acts that take place during the different time of the day. In this game, you will control both Sonic and Ashuro. The two characters have similar movement but use a different approach on various obstacles like water and high places. If you can collect 50 coins during the gameplay, you will transform into a more powerful form. Good luck!

name: Sonic in Troll Island
description:
Sonic 1, except you are constantly being trolled. A funny sonic hack with a lot of trolling going on.

Sonic in Troll Island is a Sonic 1 hack, which main focus is to be a very fun and entertaining game for those who will play, with some pretty funny stuff at the levels and with a great soundtrack too!

name: Magic Carpet 1001
description: Magic Carpet 1001 is an unlicensed Action game, developed by MegaSoft and published by Gluk, which was released in Europe in 1991.

name: Nice Cats
description: Nice Cats is a budget priced game for children. It has four activities on it's main menu, one of which just adjusts the sound levels. The other three activities are:

name: Sonic Triple Trouble SMS
description: Sonic Triple Trouble SMS is a fan-made Master System port of the original Sonic Triple Trouble, which was only released for the Game Gear and never got a Master System version. This port has been created by modifying the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Master System.

name: Minecraft: Nether Update
description: Minecraft: Village & Pillage is a major update for Minecraft: Java Edition themed around revamping the Nether. It adds multiple new features to this dimension, such as new biomes and mobs.

name: Minecraft: Nether Update
description: Minecraft: Village & Pillage is a major update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition themed around revamping the Nether. It adds multiple new features to this dimension, such as new biomes and mobs.

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part I
description: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part I is the first part, focused on blocks and mobs, of two major themed updates for Minecraft: Java Edition.

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part I
description: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part I is the first part, focused on blocks and mobs, of two major themed updates for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

name: The Jumping Burger: Halloween Edition - Turbo
description: Join Big B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Cat Fun
description: Cat Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Nuclear Throne Ultra
description: This is a mod for Vlambeer's game Nuclear Throne that adds new characters, new areas, 100s of new weapons (which you can now upgrade), and new game modes.

name: Halloween Candy Run
description: Halloween Candy Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your spooky Halloween candy run.

name: Rayman: The Dark Magician's Reign of Terror
description: This is a Rayman 1 styled fan game from the Rayman Redemption developer.

name: Crash Bandicoot Psyched Out
description: Crash Bandicoot is back in another fan-game adventure! This time the evil N.Trance has brainwashed the entire planet and brought his army of interdimensional aliens to wreak havoc across the globe. Only Crash and his nemesis Dr. Neo Cortex are spared from being N.Trance's slaves, and must once again team up to put an end to his twisted reign! Play as both characters as you travel the planet and quite literally pick the brains of your favorite characters from the crash-verse! Are you ready to get psyched?

name: Crash Bandicoot Apocalypse
description:
Crash Bandicoot is back in a brand new fan game adventure! The evil Uka Uka and Neo Cortex have unleashed the powers of nature once again to wreak havoc on the planet. Crash must stop the evil duo at all costs before Uka Uka's plans of a new evil empire are realized.

Run, jump, spin, slide and slam your way through the colorful world of Crash, fight powerful bosses, find secret areas, discover treasure, and defeat the forces of evil!

name: Ambien
description: AMBIEN is a mod for Omori that is largely focused on expanding the blackspace area of the game. It has a new storyline, over 70 unique maps and two endings.

name: Super Mario Eclipse
description: Super Mario Eclipse is part beta restoration, part enhancement, part original mod, and all fan service. With dozens upon dozens of new missions, fully custom worlds, challenging secret courses, and an interconnected Isle Delfino to boot, this is the Super Mario Sunshine experience you always wanted- and then some!
